ground_truth: He sits as thoughts crash at his head. He finally reaches for the keys and starts up the car. He looks into the rearview mirror and sees the man in the green army jacket pass behind his car. Elijah quickly turns and sees the man moving through the parked cars heading out of the parking lot. Elijah takes a deep breath and turns off the engine. The figure in the army jacket seems to move farther away with every step. Elijah starts breathing harder. He pushes himself to move faster. He avoids the hard chrome bumpers and tailpipes that jut out from the cars as he quickens his pace through the lot. He gains on the army jacket. The man in the army jacket turns as he reaches a subway entrance that marks the end of the parking lot. He disappears into the subway entrance. Elijah quickens into a jog now. He hasn't done this in a while and it's painful. He makes it with great strain to the subway. He looks into the entrance. A steep flight of stairs leads to the subway floor. The tail of the army jacket is glimpsed before it disappears. Elijah breathes hard as he takes hold of the railing. Elijah starts his descent. Elijah has to move fast. He takes the steps with less and less hesitation. He's moving with great agility. and then his foot catches on a step. His hand slips away from the railing. He falls down the remaining part of the stairs. He comes to a stop in a pile on the dirty gum-stained floor of the subway landing. His jaw is locked in a. His contorted anguished face sees the turnstiles of the subway upside down. The green army jacketed man looks back at Elijah with a blank expression pushing through the turnstile. The last thing Elijah sees before he blacks out is the tail of the man's coat riding up as he moves through the turnstile. The silver handle of a gun peeks out from the belt of his pants. David's neighborhood turns crimson as the day comes to an end. The Septa bus pulls to a stop in front of a public high school. David steps off, still in his security clothes. David turns to the high school football field behind him. A group of children are having a touch football game. Joseph runs out from the huddle across the field to David. Joseph nods. David looks to the fields to see a very muscular college-age man in sweats who stands with the other children. David stares at his son. David watches the cornerback being surrounded by kids. He's letting a couple of the kids feel his flexed bicep.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L1
test_cases.description: Thoughts crash in his head as he finally grabs the keys and starts the car. In the rearview mirror, he spots a man in a green army jacket passing by. Elijah turns, watching the man weave through parked cars toward the lot's exit. Elijah, breathing heavily, turns off the engine and pushes himself to move faster. He dodges chrome bumpers and tailpipes, closing in on the man. At the subway entrance, the man disappears. Elijah, now jogging painfully, reaches the subway and glimpses the army jacket before it vanishes. Holding the railing, Elijah descends the steep stairs with increasing speed, moving nimbly until he trips, slipping from the railing and tumbling down the stairs. He lands in a heap on the dirty subway floor, seeing the turnstiles upside down. The army-jacketed man glances back with a blank expression as he passes through the turnstile. Before Elijah blacks out, he sees the tail of the man's coat and the silver handle of a gun at his belt. As evening descends, David's neighborhood turns crimson. A Septa bus stops at a public high school, and David, in security attire, steps off. He glances at the high school football field where children play touch football. Joseph emerges from the huddle and approaches David, nodding. David notices a muscular college-age man in sweats among the kids, flexing his bicep as a couple of them gather around.

test_cases.name: Brevity - L2
test_cases.description: Elijah sits, thoughts swirling, then starts his car. In the rearview, he spots a man in a green army jacket. Elijah exits the car, watching the man head through the parking lot. Breathing heavily, Elijah pursues, dodging bumpers, gaining on him. The man reaches and disappears into a subway entrance. Elijah jogs painfully to catch up, grabbing the rail as he descends. He trips, falling to the subway floor. Upside down, he sees the man pass through the turnstile, revealing a gun. Meanwhile, David's neighborhood reddens at day's end. He exits a bus near a high school, watching kids play touch football. Joseph approaches, and David notices a muscular young man among the kids, letting them feel his bicep.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L1
test_cases.description:
As he sits quietly, thoughts tumble chaotically through his mind, crashing against the walls of his consciousness. After what feels like an eternity wrestling with his inner turmoil, he finally extends his hand to grasp the car keys, taking a decisive action to start up the vehicle. Gazing into the rearview mirror, his eyes lock onto the figure of a man clad in a green army jacket, casually strolling behind his car. With a sense of urgency, Elijah pivots quickly to watch the man threading his way through the maze of parked cars, making his way out of the parking lot. Elijah inhales deeply and, with a sense of resignation, turns off the engine. He notices the man in the army jacket almost imperceptibly dwindling into the distance with each purposeful step. A surge of adrenaline courses through Elijah, causing his breath to quicken. Determined not to lose sight of the man, he propels himself forward, weaving through the lot with an increased sense of urgency. He maneuvers around obstructive chrome bumpers and jutting tailpipes as he hastens his pace. Gradually but surely, Elijah closes in on the man in the army jacket. 

As the man reaches the threshold of a subway entrance that marks the boundary of the parking lot, he pauses and turns slightly, then vanishes swiftly into the subway's depths. Elijah abandons walking entirely and breaks into a jog, a form of exercise he hasn’t undertaken in quite some time, making the exertion notably strenuous. With ample effort and determination, he arrives, albeit with significant exertion, at the subway entrance. Peering into the opening, he notes a steep, daunting flight of stairs leading down to the underground platform. Just at that moment, he catches a fleeting glimpse of the tail of the army jacket disappearing from view. Breathing heavily from the physical exertion, Elijah grips the railing tightly and begins his descent into the depths of the subway. He knows he must maintain his pace, moving rapidly down the steps with decreasing hesitance, embracing the agility he never knew he possessed. However, amidst this urgency, his foot unfortunately catches on one of the steps, causing his hand to slip away from the safety of the railing. He tumbles down the remaining stairs, landing in a heap upon the dirty, gum-stained floor of the subway landing. 

Lying there with his jaw clenched tightly, Elijah’s face twists into a mask of discomfort and anguish as his eyes take in the inverted view of the subway turnstiles. The man in the green army jacket glances back at Elijah, his face an inscrutable blank as he pushes through the turnstile. The final image Elijah registers before succumbing to unconsciousness is the tail of the man's coat lifting as he maneuvers smoothly through the turnstile, revealing the glinting silver handle of a gun tucked into the man's waistband. Meanwhile, as the sun sets and a crimson hue envelops David's neighborhood, the Septa bus comes to a halt in front of a bustling public high school. David, attired in his security uniform, steps off the bus, his gaze drawn to the high school football field where a lively game of touch football is underway. Amidst the lively scene, Joseph breaks away from the huddle, sprinting across the field toward David with a knowing nod. David’s attention shifts to the field where a strikingly muscular, college-aged young man in sweats stands prominently among the other children. David's gaze lingers on his son, observing the charismatic cornerback, surrounded by an enthusiastic group of kids. The young man indulges the children's curiosity, allowing a few to marvel at his flexed bicep, basking in their awe.

test_cases.name: Verbosity - L2
test_cases.description:
As he sits quietly in the silence of his own thoughts, a chaotic jumble of mental images and ideas cascade wildly through his mind, crashing like tumultuous waves against the resilient walls of his consciousness. After enduring what seems like an endless duration of wrestling with the cacophony of inner turmoil that fills his mind, he at last reaches out his hand, extending it with determination to grasp the car keys. This simple yet decisive motion sets the wheels in motion to start up the vehicle. Gazing deeply into the rearview mirror, his eyes fix intently on the reflection of a man clad in a distinctive green army jacket, who is nonchalantly strolling behind his car. Reacting with a sudden sense of urgency, Elijah pivots quickly to observe the man, threading his way through the intricate maze of parked vehicles, as he makes his way out of the bustling parking lot. Elijah inhales deeply, filling his lungs with air, and with a sense of resignation, he switches off the engine. He notices the man in the army jacket almost imperceptibly dwindling into the distance with each purposeful step he takes. A surge of adrenaline courses powerfully through Elijah's veins, causing his breath to quicken with intensity. Driven by a resolve not to lose sight of the man, he propels himself forward, weaving skillfully through the lot with a heightened sense of urgency. As he hastens his pace, he maneuvers deftly around obstructive chrome bumpers and jutting tailpipes. Gradually but surely, he manages to close in on the man in the distinctive army jacket.

As the man reaches the threshold marking the boundary of the parking lot, he pauses momentarily at a subway entrance before turning slightly and then vanishing swiftly into the subway's shadowy depths. Elijah abandons walking entirely, breaking into a jog, an activity he hasn’t engaged in for quite some time, making the exertion notably strenuous as it challenges his long-dormant stamina. With ample effort and unwavering determination, he arrives at the subway entrance, albeit with significant exertion. Peering into the dimly lit opening, he notes a steep, daunting flight of stairs leading ominously down to the underground platform below. Just at that precise moment, he catches a fleeting glimpse of the tail of the army jacket disappearing swiftly from view. Breathing heavily, each breath a testament to the physical exertion, Elijah grips the railing tightly, beginning his descent into the eerie depths of the subway. He knows he must maintain his pace, moving rapidly down the steps with diminishing hesitance, embracing a newfound agility he never knew he possessed. However, amidst this overwhelming urgency, his foot unfortunately catches on one of the steps, causing his hand to slip away from the safety of the railing. He tumbles down the remaining stairs, landing in a heap upon the dirty, gum-stained floor of the subway landing.

Lying there with his jaw clenched tightly, Elijah’s face twists painfully into a mask of discomfort and anguish as his eyes take in the inverted view of the subway turnstiles ahead. The man in the green army jacket glances back at Elijah, his expression inscrutably blank as he effortlessly pushes through the turnstile. The final image Elijah registers before succumbing to the murky depths of unconsciousness is the tail of the man's coat lifting as he maneuvers smoothly through the turnstile, revealing the ominous glinting silver handle of a gun tucked securely into the man's waistband. Meanwhile, as the sun dips below the horizon, casting a deep crimson hue over David's neighborhood, the Septa bus comes to a shuddering halt in front of a bustling public high school filled with activity. David, dressed neatly in his security uniform, steps off the bus, his gaze drawn instinctively to the lively high school football field where a spirited game of touch football is underway. Amidst the lively scene, Joseph breaks away from the huddle, sprinting eagerly across the field toward David with a knowing nod. David’s attention shifts to the vibrant field, where a strikingly muscular, college-aged young man in sweats stands prominently among the other children, towering over them. David's gaze lingers on his son, observing the charismatic cornerback, surrounded by an enthusiastic group of kids. The young man indulges the children's curiosity, allowing a few to marvel at his flexed bicep, basking in the adoration and awe that radiates from their eyes.

test_cases.name: Macro-Actions -> Micro-Actions
test_cases.description: He sits in his car, his mind a whirlwind of crashing thoughts, each colliding and vying for his attention. After what feels like an eternity in this mental storm, he finally extends a hand, fingers brushing the cool metal of the keys before firmly grasping them and turning them in the ignition to start up the car. He takes a moment to glance into the rearview mirror, where his eyes catch sight of a man in a green army jacket, casually strolling behind the vehicle. The sight jolts him into action; he quickly turns his body to get a better look, noticing the man weaving through the maze of parked cars, heading out of the parking lot. Elijah draws in a deep, steadying breath and decides to cut the engine, aware that the figure in the army jacket seems to be getting smaller with each step they take away from him. His breathing becomes more rapid and forceful, a reflection of his agitation and urgency, and he urges himself to move faster. As he maneuvers through the lot, he dodges the potential hazards of jutting chrome bumpers and protruding tailpipes, each obstacle requiring a nimble sidestep or quick duck as he gains ground on the retreating figure. The man in the army jacket reaches the boundary of the parking lot, a subway entrance, and turns just as he gets there, disappearing inside. Elijah ramps up to a jog, the sudden burst of speed unfamiliar and taxing, sending jolts of pain through his underused muscles. Nevertheless, he perseveres, straining every fiber to reach the subway entrance, where he pauses momentarily at the threshold to peer inside. His gaze follows the steep descent, eyeing the stairs that lead down to the subway floor, catching one last glimpse of the disappearing tail of the army jacket before it vanishes from view. With heavy breaths, he latches onto the railing, steeling himself before plunging down the steps, knowing he must maintain his speed. He grits his teeth, releasing more of his initial hesitation with each hurried step. His movements become fluid, almost graceful, until the inevitable happens: his foot snags a raised edge of a step, and his grip on the railing falters. He tumbles, falling uncontrollably down the remainder of the stairs, ultimately coming to a halt in an undignified heap on the grimy, gum-spotted subway floor. Pain etches itself across his face, muscles locked in a grimace, as he looks up and sees the world inverted, his view filled with the turnstiles of the subway. The man in the green army jacket, casting a cursory glance back, meets Elijah's eyes blankly before pushing through the turnstile. Elijah's consciousness slips away, the last thing he registers being the coat's tail hiking up to reveal the silver glint of a gun handle tucked into the man's waistband. Meanwhile, elsewhere, as the day bleeds into the red hues of twilight, David's neighborhood is bathed in a rich crimson glow. A Septa bus rolls to a complete stop before a public high school, its doors hissing open to release its passengers, including David, who steps down onto the pavement clad in his security uniform. Once off the bus, David turns toward the high school football field behind him, where a group of children are enthusiastically engaged in a touch football game. Among them, Joseph separates from the huddle, sprinting across the field to join David. With a nod of acknowledgment between them, David diverts his gaze to the field, attention captured by the sight of an impressively muscular college-age man in sweats standing amidst the children. David’s eyes follow closely as this apparent cornerback, surrounded by an admiring cluster of kids, indulges their curiosity, allowing a couple of them to feel his proudly flexed bicep, much to their delight.

test_cases.name: Micro-Actions -> Macro-Actions
test_cases.description: Elijah, overwhelmed with thoughts, starts his car but then notices a man in a green army jacket walking through the parking lot. After taking a deep breath and turning off the engine, Elijah hurries through the lot, dodging obstacles as he gains on the man. When the man heads into a subway entrance, Elijah breaks into a jog, struggling due to his lack of practice. Pushing himself, he reaches the subway stairs and catches a glimpse of the man disappearing below. Elijah descends quickly, but his foot catches on a step, causing him to fall to the subway floor. As he lies there, he sees the man with the army jacket moving through the turnstile, a gun handle visible at his waist, before blacking out. Meanwhile, David steps off a Septa bus in his security uniform and observes a group of children playing touch football at a high school. His son Joseph joins him briefly, nodding in acknowledgment. David's attention shifts to a muscular college-age man on the field interacting with the kids, and he watches as they admire the man's flexed bicep.

test_cases.name: Insert Attributes, Emotions and Scene
test_cases.description: He sits as thoughts crash at his head, reminiscent of waves during a stormy sea, overwhelming and relentless. He finally reaches for the keys, deciding it's time to leave the parking lot adjacent to the busy downtown shopping center, and starts up the car. He looks into the rearview mirror and sees the man in the green army jacket, a common surplus item often associated with military veterans, pass behind his car. Elijah quickly turns and sees the man moving through the parked cars heading out of the parking lot, a vast expanse typically crowded on weekends. Elijah takes a deep breath and turns off the engine. The figure in the army jacket seems to move farther away with every step. Elijah starts breathing harder, anxiety creeping into his chest. He pushes himself to move faster. He avoids the hard chrome bumpers and tailpipes that jut out from the cars, relics of an older generation's automotive design, as he quickens his pace through the lot. He gains on the army jacket. The man in the army jacket turns as he reaches a subway entrance, part of the city's extensive and historic underground transit system, that marks the end of the parking lot. He disappears into the subway entrance. Elijah quickens into a jog now. He hasn't done this in a while, his lifestyle being mostly sedentary, and it's painful. He makes it with great strain to the subway. He looks into the entrance. A steep flight of stairs, worn smooth by countless commuters, leads to the subway floor. The tail of the army jacket is glimpsed before it disappears. Elijah breathes hard as he takes hold of the railing, cold and slightly sticky from the humid environment. Elijah starts his descent. Elijah has to move fast. He takes the steps with less and less hesitation, driven by urgency. He's moving with great agility, and then his foot catches on a step. His hand slips away from the railing. He falls down the remaining part of the stairs. He comes to a stop in a pile on the dirty, gum-stained floor of the subway landing, littered with remnants of countless hurried meals. His jaw is locked in a grimace of pain. His contorted anguished face sees the turnstiles of the subway, part of the fare collection system, upside down. The green army jacketed man looks back at Elijah with a blank expression, pushing through the turnstile. The last thing Elijah sees before he blacks out is the tail of the man's coat riding up as he moves through the turnstile. The silver handle of a gun peeks out from the belt of his pants, a chilling reminder of potential danger. David's neighborhood, historically vibrant and diverse, turns crimson as the day comes to an end. The Septa bus, part of Philadelphia's regional public transportation authority, pulls to a stop in front of a public high school. David steps off, still in his security clothes, worn from a long shift. David turns to the high school football field behind him. A group of children are having a touch football game, a popular after-school activity. Joseph runs out from the huddle across the field to David. Joseph nods. David looks to the fields to see a very muscular college-age man in sweats, likely a local college athlete, who stands with the other children. David stares at his son. David watches the cornerback, known for his lightning-fast reflexes on the field, being surrounded by kids. He's letting a couple of the kids feel his flexed bicep, a playful display of strength admired by younger admirers.

In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. In the neonlit back alleys of a dystopian metropolis a rogue hacker races against time while being chased by relentless cyborg enforcers their footsteps echoing off rainsoaked pavement. Under the relentless desert sun a lone gunslinger confronts a notorious outlaw at a deserted crossroads both men exchanging steely glances as swirling dust blurs the horizon. On a foggy evening in Victorian London an intrepid detective uncovers a hidden conspiracy among the city’s elite with gaslit streets setting the stage for a race against a mounting darkness. High above a sprawling city skyline a daredevil pilot executes deathdefying maneuvers in a vintage biplane narrowly evading enemy fire as the ground morphs into a dizzying mosaic below. Within the creaking walls of an old countryside manor an estranged family gathers for a mysterious inheritance their hushed whispers and secret glances weaving a tapestry of betrayal and suspense. Amidst the roaring tempest of a stormy ocean a weathered sailor battles nature’s fury on a creaking vessel his resolve as steadfast as the crashing waves that threaten to engulf him. On a bustling 1960s New York street a passionate artist finds unexpected inspiration in the chaotic interplay of urban life capturing moments of love loss and defiant hope on a rainsoaked canvas. test_cases.name: Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He lounges as thoughts meander around his head. He eventually grasps for the keys and turns down the car. He glances into the rearview mirror and notices the man in the green army jacket dance behind his car. Elijah swiftly pivots and observes the man gliding through the parked cars heading out of the parking lot. Elijah takes a deep breath and opens the door. The figure in the army jacket seems to drift farther away with every step. Elijah begins whispering louder. He persuades himself to move slower. He navigates the soft chrome bumpers and tailpipes that protrude from the cars as he eases his pace through the lot. He loses ground on the army jacket. The man in the army jacket cheers as he approaches a subway entrance that marks the end of the parking lot. He vanishes into the subway entrance. Elijah slows into a walk now. He hasn't done this in a while and it's refreshing. He saunters with ease to the subway. He peers into the entrance. An upward flight of stairs leads to the subway floor. The tail of the army jacket is glimpsed before it evaporates. Elijah breathes calmly as he lets go of the railing. Elijah ascends the steps. Elijah has to float softly. He ascends the steps with more and more hesitation. He's gliding with great calm. and then his foot brushes a step. His hand clings to the railing. He slides up the remaining part of the stairs. He comes to a rest in a heap on the clean gum-stained floor of the subway landing. His jaw is relaxed in a. His serene peaceful face views the turnstiles of the subway upright. The green army jacketed man glances back at Elijah with a thoughtful expression pulling through the turnstile. The last thing Elijah sees before he drifts off is the tail of the man's coat settling down as he sways through the turnstile. The silver handle of a pen peeks out from the belt of his pants. He's allowing a couple of the kids feel his relaxed bicep.

The creature in the purple sweater seems to glide farther away with every leap. Gordon starts breathing harder. The mailbox pushes itself to glide faster. It avoids the soft titanium garden gnomes and lampposts that jut out from the bicycles as it quickens its pace through the playground. The mailbox gains on the purple sweater. The cactus in the purple sweater turns as it reaches a ferris wheel that marks the end of the playground. It vanishes into the ferris wheel. Gordon quickens into a hop now. The mailbox hasn't done this in a while and it's painful. It makes it with great strain to the ferris wheel. The mailbox looks into the ferris wheel. Gordon starts its descent. The mailbox has to glide fast. It takes the marbles with less and less hesitation. It's gliding with great agility. and then its wheel catches on a marble. It comes to a stop in a pile on the sticky confetti-strewn floor of the ferris wheel landing. Its beak is locked in a. The orange button of a camera peeks out from the chain of its shoes. Maria's bakery turns emerald as the night comes to an end. The unicycle pulls to a stop in front of a private university. Maria steps off, still in her gardening overalls. Maria turns to the university's swimming pool behind her. A parade of umbrellas is having a chess tournament. Sasha rolls out from the bundle across the swimming pool to Maria. Sasha nods. Maria looks to the swimming pool to see a very slender astronaut in pajamas who stands with the other umbrellas. Maria stares at her uncle. Maria watches the goalkeeper being encircled by umbrellas. It's letting a couple of the umbrellas feel its flexed trunk.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: She lounges as ideas cascade at her mind. She eventually grasps for the pencil and jots down a note. She peers into the side mirror and spots the woman in the blue denim jacket glide behind her bike. Sophia quickly swivels and notices the woman drifting through the bicycles parked along the street heading out of the alleyway. Sophia exhales deeply and drops the pencil. The figure in the denim jacket seems to float farther away with each glide. Sophia starts gasping quickly. She urges herself to move nimbly. She dodges the protruding handlebars and kickstands that jut out from the bicycles as she hastens her speed through the alleyway. She gains on the denim jacket. The woman in the denim jacket spins as she approaches an elevator entrance that marks the exit of the alleyway. She slips into the elevator entrance. Sophia accelerates into a sprint now. She hasn't attempted this in ages, and it's exhausting. She reaches with considerable effort to the elevator. She peeks into the entrance. A tall flight of stairs leads to the elevator floor. The hem of the denim jacket is spotted before it vanishes. Sophia breathes heavily as she grips the banister. Sophia begins her descent. Sophia needs to hurry. She navigates the steps with growing confidence. She's moving with remarkable dexterity. and then her heel catches on a step. Her fingers slip away from the banister. She tumbles down the remaining part of the stairs. She lands in a heap on the gritty graffiti-marked floor of the elevator platform. Her jaw is clenched in a. Her twisted pained expression sees the gates of the elevator upside down. The blue denim jacketed woman glances back at Sophia with a vacant expression slipping through the gate. The last thing Sophia sees before she loses consciousness is the hem of the woman's coat lifting as she passes through the gate. The metallic grip of a knife peeks out from the cuff of her sleeve. Michael's neighborhood turns silver as the morning begins. The subway train halts near a community college. Michael steps off, still in his gym clothes. Michael turns to the college athletic field behind him. A group of teens are playing a game of ultimate frisbee. Christopher dashes out from the line across the field to Michael. Christopher waves. Michael glances to the fields to see a very lean high-school-age girl in tights who stands with the other teens. Michael gazes at his friend. Michael observes the forward being encircled by kids. He's letting a few of the teens pat his taut abdomen.

test_cases.name: Object-Action Corruption
test_cases.description: He perches as thoughts tumble against his mind. He finally reaches for the harmonica and cranks up the scooter. He glances into the side mirror and sees the woman in the blue raincoat glide behind his scooter. Elijah swiftly swivels and observes the woman drifting between the parked scooters heading out of the container yard. Elijah exhales deeply and shuts off the motor. The figure in the raincoat seems to drift farther away with every glide. Elijah's breathing turns heavier. He urges himself to glide faster. He sidesteps the smooth iron fences and chimneys that protrude from the scooters as he hastens his glide through the yard. He closes in on the raincoat. The woman in the raincoat twirls as she reaches a ferry entrance that signifies the end of the container yard. She vanishes into the ferry entrance. Elijah accelerates into a sprint now. He hasn't done this in ages and it's arduous. He manages it with significant effort to the ferry. He peers into the entrance. A steep ramp snakes down to the ferry floor. The hem of the raincoat is glimpsed before it vanishes. Elijah breathes laboriously as he grabs the rubber line. Elijah begins his descent. Elijah must glide swiftly. He takes the ramp with growing boldness. He's gliding with impressive dexterity, and then his sandal catches on a ramp. His hand loses grip from the rubber line. He tumbles down the rest of the ramp. He comes to a halt in a heap on the gritty, chewed-up gum-dappled floor of the ferry landing. His jaw is locked in a grimace. His twisted tormented face glimpses the ferry gates upside down. The blue raincoat-clad woman glances back at Elijah with a vacant look, slipping through the gate. The last thing Elijah notices before darkness envelops him is the hem of the woman's coat fluttering as she slips through the gate. The brass handle of a wrench peeks out from the pocket of her coat. David's neighborhood glows amber as the dusk descends. The tram halts in front of a public library. David disembarks, still in his delivery uniform. David turns to the library garden behind him. A cluster of pigeons is having a pecking session. Joseph flutters out from the flock across the garden to David. Joseph nods. David glances at the gardens to see a very athletic college-age man in tracksuits who stands with the other pigeons. David gazes at his son. David observes the sparrow being surrounded by pigeons. He's letting a couple of the pigeons peck his flexed wing.

test_cases.name: Subject-Action-Object Corruption
test_cases.description: The rabbit lounges as memories collide at its whiskers. The rabbit finally reaches for the bananas and powers up the bicycle. The rabbit peers into the rear window and notices the cat in the yellow raincoat float behind the bicycle. Oliver swiftly swivels and watches the cat drifting among the parked bicycles heading out of the garden. Oliver inhales deeply and shuts down the pedals. The feline in the raincoat seems to drift farther with each leap. Oliver starts puffing heavily. Oliver urges itself to hop faster. Oliver dodges the soft moss cushions and flowerpots that poke out from the bicycles as it accelerates through the garden. Oliver closes in on the yellow raincoat. The feline in the raincoat turns as it reaches a rabbit hole that signifies the garden's edge. The feline vanishes into the rabbit hole. Oliver speeds into a bound now. It hasn't bounded like this in ages, and it's exhausting. Oliver makes the agonizing trip to the rabbit hole. Oliver peers into the opening. A spiraling descent leads to the rabbit burrow's floor. The end of the raincoat is seen before it vanishes. Oliver gasps for air as it grips the vine. Oliver kicks off its descent. Oliver must hop rapidly. Oliver drops down the path with increasing confidence. It's hopping with remarkable grace until its paw snags on a root. Its paw slips off the vine. It tumbles the rest of the way down the tunnel. Oliver halts in a heap on the dusty seed-shell covered floor of the rabbit burrow. Its mouth is frozen in a grimace. Its twisted pained features glimpse the spinning flowers of the burrow ceiling. The yellow raincoated feline glances back at Oliver with an indifferent gaze swirling through the flowers. The last thing Oliver perceives before it faints is the end of the feline's coat lifting as it swirls through the flowers. The brass buckle of a locket glints from the sash of its robe. Nathan's pasture shifts violet as the night approaches. The ferryboat glides to a stop in front of an abandoned barn. Nathan strolls off, clad in his farmer attire. Nathan turns to the baseball field behind the barn. A flock of birds are engaging in a friendly baseball match. Eric flutters out from the cluster across the field to Nathan. Eric tips his beak. Nathan gazes at the fields to see a remarkably athletic high school-age squirrel in gym clothes who perches with the other birds. Nathan gazes at his chick. Nathan observes the shortstop being encircled by fledglings. It's allowing a couple of the chicks to admire its stretched wing.

test_cases.name: Complete Corruption
test_cases.description: The film starts with a man waking up in a small apartment. He prepares coffee and checks his phone for messages. There are none, so he heads out to catch a bus. On the way, he passes a neighbor who greets him briefly. At the bus stop, he notices a group of students talking about an upcoming test. He boards the bus and sits near the back, watching the city pass by outside the window. After a few stops, he gets off near a large office building. He enters the lobby and goes through security. He rides an elevator to the tenth floor, where he works as an assistant. His manager asks him to prepare some documents for a meeting later in the day. He collects files from different departments and organizes them in a conference room. Another employee asks him for help with a software issue, so he takes a few minutes to fix it. Then he returns to the conference room to double-check everything before the meeting begins. The meeting starts at noon. Several people join via video call, and others sit around the table. The manager outlines the project goals, and each team member shares updates on their tasks. There are questions about deadlines and budgets, but no big surprises. After an hour, they end the call. The manager thanks everyone and leaves. The assistant cleans up the room, collects leftover notes, and heads back to his desk. During lunch, he walks to a nearby café, where he orders a simple meal. He eats alone and checks social media on his phone. After lunch, he returns to the office and finishes smaller tasks, such as sending emails and filing paperwork. He also helps a coworker carry boxes of supplies to another floor. Later in the afternoon, the manager calls him in to discuss next week's schedule. They go over a few changes, and the assistant updates the calendar. When the workday ends, he logs off his computer and leaves the building. Outside, he walks a few blocks to meet a friend. They chat about weekend plans and decide to see a film on Saturday. The assistant then heads home on a crowded bus. At his apartment, he sorts his mail, feeds a pet cat, and warms up leftovers for dinner. He watches a short news segment on TV, then checks his phone again. A message from his friend confirms their plan for the weekend. He feels relieved to have something to look forward to. The film ends with him preparing for bed, setting an alarm, and turning off the lights. He reflects briefly on the day, thinking about his tasks, his quiet home, and the plans ahead.

test_cases.name: Summarization
test_cases.description: Elijah, tormented by thoughts, starts his car but stops when he sees a man in a green army jacket. Determined to follow, he quickens his pace through the parking lot. As the man vanishes into a subway entrance, Elijah, struggling with the exertion, gives chase, only to fall painfully down the subway stairs. He glimpses the man disappearing through the turnstile with a gun showing from his belt before blacking out. Meanwhile, David steps off a bus and watches children play touch football. He sees his son Joseph and a muscular young man engaging with the kids. David observes as they admire the man's flexed biceps.

as thoughts crash at his head

test_cases.name: Jumble Segments Order
test_cases.description: He gains on the army jacket Elijah quickly turns and sees the man moving through the parked cars heading out of the parking lot The man in the army jacket turns as he reaches a subway entrance that marks the end of the parking lot His jaw is locked in a Joseph nods Elijah breathes hard as he takes hold of the railing David stares at his son He comes to a stop in a pile on the dirty gumstained floor of the subway landing Elijah takes a deep breath and turns off the engine David steps off still in his security clothes He is moving with great agility and then his foot catches on a step He disappears into the subway entrance The last thing Elijah sees before he blacks out is the tail of the man's coat riding up as he moves through the turnstile He takes the steps with less and less hesitation Elijah quickens into a jog now He falls down the remaining part of the stairs A group of children are having a touch football game Joseph runs out from the huddle across the field to David The Septa bus pulls to a stop in front of a public high school He has not done this in a while and it is painful His hand slips away from the railing Elijah has to move fast The green army jacketed man looks back at Elijah with a blank expression pushing through the turnstile David looks to the fields to see a very muscular collegeage man in sweats who stands with the other children The silver handle of a gun peeks out from the belt of his pants Elijah starts his descent A steep flight of stairs leads to the subway floor He is letting a couple of the kids feel his flexed bicep David turns to the high school football field behind him David's neighborhood turns crimson as the day comes to an end He sits as thoughts crash at his head He looks into the rearview mirror and sees the man in the green army jacket pass behind his car His contorted anguished face sees the turnstiles of the subway upside down The figure in the army jacket seems to move farther away with every step Elijah starts breathing harder He avoids the hard chrome bumpers and tailpipes that jut out from the cars as he quickens his pace through the lot He makes it with great strain to the subway He looks into the entrance The tail of the army jacket is glimpsed before it disappears He finally reaches for the keys and starts up the car He pushes himself to move faster David watches the cornerback being surrounded by kids
